about_the_game:
No H-scenes, nudity only!

Time Traveling, cute girls, Match3 with Smart AI and Deck Building! Travel through five epochs and challenge 15 stunning characters in strategic battles. This game combines puzzle-solving with strategy, offering a captivating gameplay experience. Engage in a world where every match counts and your deck-building skills are as crucial as your puzzle-solving abilities. Get ready for a Match3 adventure like no other, where history and strategy intertwine.

15 girls to undress

So many cute enemies to undress. Each opponent presents a unique ability, with up to four distinct skills and a tactical AI designed to test your limits. Learn their strengths and weaknesses to gain the upper hand in every battle.

5 Epochs of Adventure

Delve into Prehistoric Era, Ancient Egypt, Hellenistic Greece, Fairy East and Ancient China. Every epoch boasts distinct gems, intriguing tales, and powerful artifacts. Uncover the rich stories and historical secrets that lie within each era, providing an immersive gameplay experience.

Deck Building

Collect over 40 skill cards to create your ultimate deck. With countless combinations at your disposal, adapt your strategy to outwit opponents, who also wield their own formidable skills. Strategy and adaptability are key to your success.

Powerful Artifacts

Enhance your journey with artifacts that boost your deck's capabilities. Wisely combine these with your skills to maximize your potential and secure victory against formidable foes.

Dive into History

Engage with interactive scenarios and a deep, evolving storyline that responds to your choices. Discover the stories of those you encounter and shape your path through the ages.

Prepare for a Match3 adventure where history, strategy, and charm intertwine.

content_descriptors.notes: The player can undress all opponents he fights.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.15
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core M
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 13.3
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM

name: ChronoBabes

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5000
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce 1050
  • Storage: 1100 MB available space

short_description: Match3 adventure with 15 hot babes to undress. 5 unique eras, 28 skill deck building, interactive story and smart AI. Build your deck, find cool artifacts and enjoy epic battles!
supported_languages:
English*, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
